Essential tools for ten pin bowlers and coaches including:  

1. Angles & Targeting
2. Axis Tilt & Rotation
3. Ball Speed & RPM
4. Observation Trainer
5. Pattern Library
6. Bowling Ball Arsenal
7. Notes
8. Score Calculator
9. Spare Names

---

1. Angles & Targeting

Plan & visualize a shot from the start of your approach to your target, helping you become more accurate and consistent.⁠ Add overlays, such as entry angle, focal point, distance markers, and save favorite shots.

Video mode can apply all the above to previously recorded videos, or use camera more when practicing, with up to 30sec delay, for continuous action replay of every shot.

---

2. Axis Tilt & Rotation

Take a photo or video of your ball with a PAP (Positive Axis Point) marker and position it in the guide for your approximate axis tilt and rotation.  Great for working on control & consistency.⁠

---

3. Ball Speed & RPM

In simple mode use the start/stop button to calculate ball speed in real time.Advanced mode can load in a video for more accuracy, and rev-rate calculation.⁠

---

4. Observation Trainer

When we let go of the ball, many of us immediately look up to see the end result at the pins. We don't see the journey the ball takes to, and through, the pins, so don’t see differences between pocket hits that do and don’t carry. ⁠
⁠
Practice ANYWHERE with the Observation Trainer and learn to focus on four key points of every shot that give you the info you need to make better decisions and start striking more.

---

5. Pattern Library

Instant access to details & diagrams of hundreds of oil patterns, or enter your own custom patterns. Load any pattern into Angles & Targeting to plot your shot directly over it and plan how you'll attack the lanes.

---

6. Bowling Ball Arsenal

Searchable library of over 1,500 balls and a way to manage your own arsenal. Organise balls into separate bags and keep track of information such as surface, layout, important dates and more. When looking for something new, use the Ball Library to find exactly what you want, with filters for brand, cover & core types, RG, Diff and more.

---

7. Notes

Keep track of information about your game and equipment. Create general notes, or add notes from within most of the other tools, such as for oil patterns, your bowling balls, Speed & RPM readings, Observation Trainer scores and more.

---

8. Score Calculator

Whether earning how scoring works, teaching youth bowlers how to score, or just giving your brain a rest at a Triple-X fun night, there's lots of reasons the Score Calculator can come in handy!

---

9. Spare Names

Just for fun, tap the pins to see nicknames of common spares you probably don’t want to be leaving!

---

Swim Stopwatch is an app created for swim coaches by a high school swim coach.  The intent is to solve problems associated with timing multiple swimmers/relays in the pool at one time.

Swim Stopwatch's unique and original layout allows a single coach to time all of their swimmers while also freeing them up to focus on the race and not their watch.  All you need to do is hit the large button which creates individual split boxes for each split time.  You watch the race and hit the button whenever you need a split, then while swimmers are swimming their next leg you take a short moment to drag their split time to the appropriate lane and split number.  Swim Stopwatch will calculate the split and cumulative times for you so that you don't have to do any math.
